title: 12/29/20 – HOUR 1 – Cam Newton’s Career Is Officially Over!
itunes:title: 12/29/20 – HOUR 1 – Cam Newton’s Career Is Officially Over!
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre fill in for Dan Patrick and declare the end of Cam Newton’s career as a starting quarterback in the NFL. The guys get in a fiery debate over whether or not Carson Wentz is handling adversity in an appropriate fashion. Plus, who is the MVP of the NFL this year? Patrick Mahomes or Aaron Rodgers?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
